name: Orca Project
tagline: This interactive map is on SeaWorld's international ineffective breeding program. Each data point represents an unsuccessful birth (fetus, stillbirth, and miscarriage)
body:
### Welcome to the Orca Fetus Death Count!

This interactive map is the easiest way to understand and visualize SeaWorld's ineffective breeding program.

### The Map!

https://squidgod.cartodb.com/viz/79d074ba-9181-11e5-95aa-0ef24382571b/public_map

### Share Your Anger Now!

Weâ€™ve crafted a map so that you can hate SeaWorld too! Go ahead and click on each nod to view time of death, type of death, and Mother and Father! Thanks to this wonderful interactive map you can transform your "non-believer" friends into SeaWorld hating cronies!

### Support or Contact
